abstract: President Obama announced that all American troops would be withdrawn from Iraq by the end of the year.
snippet: President Obama announced that all American troops would be withdrawn from Iraq by the end of the year.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: President Obama announced that the United States has fulfilled its commitment in Iraq and will bring all American troops home by the end of the year. "As promised, the rest of our troops in Iraq will come home by the end of the year," Mr. Obama said.

headline.main: Obama Announces Troops Will Come Home From Iraq by Year's End
